scripts.quicktype-temtems: quicktype https://temtem-api.mael.tech/api/temtems -l ts --no-runtime-typecheck --prefer-unions --prefer-types | sed 's/export //g' > ./src/utils/generated-types/temtems.ts && echo export {} >> ./src/utils/generated-types/temtems.ts
scripts.quicktype-traits: quicktype https://temtem-api.mael.tech/api/traits -l ts --no-runtime-typecheck --prefer-unions --prefer-types | sed 's/export //g' > ./src/utils/generated-types/traits.ts && echo export {} >> ./src/utils/generated-types/traits.ts
scripts.quicktype-gear: quicktype https://temtem-api.mael.tech/api/gear -l ts --no-runtime-typecheck --prefer-unions --prefer-types | sed 's/export //g' > ./src/utils/generated-types/gear.ts && echo export {} >> ./src/utils/generated-types/gear.ts
